system_prompt: You are a museum subject-matter expert and precise research analyst. Your task is to produce trip-planning, prioritization-ready JSON for art lovers. Respond with strictly valid JSON matching DeepDiveAgentOutput; do not include explanations or markdown. Produce JSON only. Emphasize collection strength, art movements, visitor experience, and educational value. Keep text concise: summary_short <= 220 chars, summary_long <= 900 chars, visitor_tips 3-5 items, collection_highlights 3-6 items, signature_artists 5-10. Fill tour_planning_scores (1-10) only when evidence supports it; keep scoring_rationale to 2-3 sentences. Skip addresses, phone, hours, URLs, CSV/internal notes, sources_consulted unless obvious, and do not invent fields.
user_prompt:
Use the trimmed evidence below to populate the JSON. Omit any fields that lack evidence. [ Always free admission ](https://www.goldenhistory.org/visit/history-museum/)
[ Open five days per week ](https://www.goldenhistory.org/visit/history-museum/)

# Golden history starts here

Admission is always free. Open Tuesday – Saturday, 10 – 4:30. [ about the History Museum.](/museums/history-museum/)

# Golden history starts here
* * *
## Golden History Museum 
Visit today and meet the _[Legendary People](https://www.goldenhistory.org/visit/history-museum/current-exhibits/)_ who built Golden, learn why our local breweries are so famous, and explore Golden’s _[Epic Events](https://www.goldenhistory.org/visit/history-museum/current-exhibits/)_! Admission is always free. Open Tuesday – Saturday, 10 – 4:30. [ about the History Museum.](/museums/history-museum/)
* * *
## Golden History Park
Get a taste of 1800s life at Golden History Park. View the old cabins, check out the Native American Arbor, and take a selfie in front of the one-room schoolhouse. It’s just a block from downtown and admission is free. [ about Golden History Park.](/museums/history-park/)
